5665.subject: [students] Academic calendar event(s) alert
5665.body:
Hello,
Following academic calendar events are starting/closing today:
    
            Academic Session : 2024-S 
            Event Name: 'Course Pre-registration End'  
            Event Date : 2025-05-24
    
Following academic calendar events are starting/closing tomorrow:
   
            Academic Session : 2024-S 
            Event Name: 'Course ADD/DROP Start'  
            Event Date : 2025-05-25   
    

Please visit academic calendar in aims portal for more details.

Thanks,
AIMS

--

5663.subject: [students] [broadcast] Re: Scheduled Internet Downtime for Security Updates – May 24, 2025
5663.body:
Dear All,
I view of ongoing International Conference and subsequent request received
from the concerned faculty member, internet downtime has been rescheduled.
Subsequently, there will be no internet from 12:30 PM to  01:00 PM.
Kind cooperation in this regard is highly solicited.
Thanks and regards
Ashutosh Kumar
STO, IT


On Fri, 23 May, 2025, 17:20 Ashutosh Kumar, <sto.it@iitrpr.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear All,
>
> Please be informed that the internet facility will be temporarily
> unavailable T*omorrow, May 24, 2025, from 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM*. This
> scheduled downtime is required to install the latest security patches and
> to enhance the safety and reliability of our network firewall.
>
> We kindly request all users to plan their activities accordingly. We
> appreciate your understanding and cooperation during this brief maintenance
> window.
> Thanks and regards
> Ashutosh Kumar
> STO, IT
>

--

5662.subject: [students] Call for Girls’ Basketball Representative – Immediate Response Needed
5662.body:
Dear All,

I hope you’re doing well.

This is a final reminder for those interested in the role of Girls’
Basketball Representative. While there has been some engagement, we are
still in need of a confirmed representative to ensure the continued
functioning and representation of the Girls’ Basketball team.

The role offers a great opportunity to contribute to the club, coordinate
events, and ensure the team remains active and visible. If you’re even
slightly considering it, I encourage you to reach out—we can discuss what
the role involves and how best to support you.

Please revert to this email by Monday, May 26 if you’re interested or have
any questions. The role is essential, and without a representative, the
club could face avoidable challenges going forward.

Thank you for your time and support.




*Regards*

---------------------

*Harjas Kaur*

*General Secretary*

*Board of Sports Activities*

+91-9805554463

Indian Institute of Technology Ropar

Rupnagar - 140001

[image: https://wa.me/919560478245]

 *“In pursuit of Excellence**”*

--
